original_text:
with you I break in pieces the horse and his rider;
    with you I break in pieces the chariot and the charioteer;
korean_text: 네가 말과 기마병을 분쇄하며 네가 병거와 병거대를 부수며

sentences.original_text: with you I break in pieces the horse and his rider
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너와 함께 말과 그 탄 자를 부수며

sentences.original_text: with you I break in pieces the chariot and the charioteer
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너와 함께 전차와 그 모는 자를 부수며
